Title: Relates to placing restrictions on the sale of flare guns
Summary: Establishes the crimes of criminal sale of a flare gun in the first and second degrees; sets restrictions on and requirements for the sale of flare guns.
LawCode: Add §§265.67 & 265.68, Pen L; add §399-qqq, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the general business law, in relation to placing restrictions on the sale of flare guns
